answers.answer: I got 25days left and im fed up now this is my secon on my 1st I was happy to be pregnant but this time round im fed up just want her here with me now x
I've been fine til last friday. LolI'm sick and can't sleep and my BP is high so i have major headachesIt *****! Lol
I've got 9 days left nd have had a great pregnancy nothing to.really complain about but the past weeki am jus done being prego.I want her out already!!! I hope I don't go past due date:(

I'm right there with you ladies...I have 11 days left and I am over being pregnant..I am also on bed rest due to high BP. I got put on a low dosage of blood pressure medicine. I had to pee in a jug for 24 hours also..that was different to say the least. I'm just ready to meet her. My doctor was going to induce on the june 4 but since nothing has changed at my weekly exams he changed his mind...which depressed me.

I have 12 days left and I am over it too!!!  For the last 2 weeks I have been 1 cm dilated and 80% effaced.  My Dr acted like I could have this little boy early, but no contractions at all!  I am so disappointed and miserable!  I havent really had any complications, except gestational diabetes.  And it just s*cks because i cant have chocolate!!!! Ok, vent over :)
I was due last Sunday! I'm so done and waiting s u c k s!!!!!! I'm so ready to meet this little one
I have 9days left & dis is my 2nd time doing the 24urine test uggggg every little thing just irrates me now im ready to have my princess but i kno imma be scared as chicken sh*t when time does come

question: I am beyond over being pregnant now.I'm so miserable and on top of it I'm sick.Which I guess doesn't matter because I'm on strict bed rest because of high BP. And I have to pee in a jug for 24 hours!Anyone else just DONE?!I'm ready to meet my daughter now!
title: 5 days left
